Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Wayaphula ke (loo mifanekiso iqingqiweyo) yaba ziingceba (yonke) kwashiyeka owona mkhulu kuyo, khona ukuze babuyele kuwo (ngemibuzo)
Bathi bona: Ngubani owenze le nto koothixo bethu? Inene yena ngomnye wabagabadeli.”
Bathi: “Sikhe seva enye indodana ithetha ngokuchasene nabo, ebizwa ngokuba nguIbrâhîm.”
Bathi: “Mziseni phambi kwamehlo wabantu, ukuze babe nobungqina.”
Bathi: “Ingaba wena ungulo wenze le nto (imbi kangaka) koothixo bethu, hini na wena Ibrâhîm?”
Wathi yena: “Nakanye, ingasuka nje ibe ngulo umkhulu kunabo owenze loo nto, ngoko ke buzani kubo ukuba (bayakwazi) ukuthetha
Ke kaloku bajongana bathi omnye komnye: “Inene nina ningabenzi bobubi.”
Baphinda barhoxa (besithi) “Uyayazi nje (nawe) into yokuba ezi (zithixo) azithethi!”
Wathi yena: “Ke ngoku nina niyikhonza (njani) endaweni ka-Allâh into engenaluncedo ingekhe inenze bungozi konke- konke?”
Mkani nina nezo nto nizinqulayo ngaphandle koAllâh! Kanti aninangqondo na?”
Bathi bona: “Mtshiseni nincedise oothixo benu ukuba kukho into ekufuneka niyenzile
Thina (SinguAllâh) Sathi: “Phola wena mlilo, usindise uIbrâhîm!”
Ke kaloku babefuna ukumonzakalisa, kodwa Thina Sabenza baba ngabona balahlekelwa kakhulu
Samhlangula ke yena (uIbrâhîm) noLût Sabasa kwilizwe eSalithamsanqelisela indalo yonke
Ke kaloku Sampha uIs-hâ’k (uIsake) nomzukulwana uYa’kûb (uYakobi) ngamnye kubo Samenza waba ngcwele
